snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s campaign war chest is a case study in how irrelevant small donors have become.
abstract: Analysis by New York Public Interest Research Group shows that while Gov Andrew M Cuomo has condemned the influence of money in politics and promised reform, only 1 percent of donors to his campaign in last two years gave less than $1,000.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s campaign war chest is a case study in how irrelevant small donors have become.

headline.seo: Few Cuomo Campaign Donors Give Less Than $1,000
headline.main: Big Donors Dominate Cuomo’s Fund-Raising, Analysis Finds
headline.print_headline: Big Donors Dominate Cuomo’s Fund-Raising, Analysis Finds

keywords.value: New York Public Interest Research Group
keywords.name: organizations
